newsitem.title: UK: Shield rises on drug trials speculation.
newsitem.headline: Shield rises on drug trials speculation.

text.p: Shares in Shield Diagnostics Group Plc jumped 25p to 274-1/2 by 0830 GMT as investors continued to build up positions ahead of an annoucement on clinical trials on its AFT coronary thrombosis detection product, dealers said.
"People are speculating ahead of news on the drug trials. We're seeing some good two-way business," one market maker said.
Last month the company said it expected to make a pretax loss for the year to March 1997 which was outside of the range of market expectations.
But the company also said it retained its confidence in AFT "as a significant product in the group's portfolio."
The company has said "definitive clinical trial data" would be available sometime during 1997.
